item.title: William and Catherine to mark Armistice Day
item.description: The Prince and Princess of Wales will be among those commemorating the end of World War One.

item.title: UK unemployment rate rises to 5% as jobs market weakens
item.description: Latest official data ahead of the Budget later this month shows it is the highest rate since 2021.

item.title: Squid Game star, 81, acquitted of sexual misconduct
item.description: The South Korean actor allegedly hugged a woman and kissed her on the cheek against her will.

item.title: Chalobah set to replace Guehi in England squad
item.description: Chelsea's Trevoh Chalobah is set to join up with the England squad to replace injured Crystal Palace defender Marc Guehi.

item.title: Scientists to stop using animals for some experiments by end of 2025
item.description: The plan follows up on a manifesto promise to work towards the phasing out the practice.
